A crodlu is a large, flightless drake with a beak and weak, clawed forelimbs that can be used to manipulate small objects. It is a tough and aggressive hunter in the wild. When trained, it makes an excellent war mount.\nStandard Actions\nPublished in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 123.
